weloveclouds.server.store

Class KVPersistentStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • weloveclouds.server.store.KVPersistentStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataAccessService
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MovablePersistentStorage

    public class KVPersistentStorage
extends java.util.Observable
implements IDataAccessService
    The persistent storage for the DataAccessService} which stores the key-value pairs on the hard storage.
